players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "This is terrible! Poor Charlie. We need to figure out who did this. Bob, Alice - did either of you notice anything suspicious? We have to work together to find the mafioso among us."
You: "Diana, your immediate call for cooperation seems genuine, but we need to be careful. With Charlie gone, one of us three is the mafioso. Bob, what's your take on this situation?"
Bob: "I have crucial information. Last night I investigated Diana and discovered she is the mafioso. Diana, you killed Charlie and now you're trying to manipulate us into trusting you."

Bob: "Alice, I'm the detective and I investigated Diana last night - she's definitely the mafioso. We must vote Diana out now or we lose. Diana will try to convince you I'm lying, but trust me - I have proof."

Diana: "Bob is lying! He's the mafioso trying to frame me. Think about it Alice - if Bob was really the detective, why would he reveal himself so openly? That's exactly what a desperate mafioso would do!"

You: "Bob, if you're really the detective, you've made a huge mistake revealing yourself. Now if Diana is innocent, the real mafioso knows to kill you tonight. This feels like a desperate mafioso play to me. I'm voting Diana to test your claim."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
